terms.definition: Psoriasis Area and Severity Index - Head (H): Area score.
Psoriasis Area and Severity Index - Head (H): Desquamation (D).
Psoriasis Area and Severity Index - Head (H): Erythema (E).
Psoriasis Area and Severity Index - Head (H): Infiltration (I).
Psoriasis Area and Severity Index - Head (H): Sum = E + I + D.
Psoriasis Area and Severity Index - Head (H): Sum x area x 0.1.
terms.preferredTerm: PASI - Head (H): Sum X Area X 0.1

terms.definition: Psoriasis Area and Severity Index - Head (H): Sum x area.
